mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MEMBER ( USERID AS userid, PASSWORD AS password, NAME AS name, ZIPCODE AS zipcode, ADDRESS1 AS address1, ADDRESS2 AS address2, TEL1 AS tel1, TEL2 AS tel2, TEL3 AS tel3, EMAIL AS email, GENDER AS gender, HOBBY AS hobby, TERMS1 AS terms1, TERMS2 AS terms2, TERMS3 AS terms3, YEAR AS year, MONTH AS month, DAY AS day, ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{hobby}, #{terms1}, #{terms2}, #{terms3}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day} )
